name: Grace Benneh
description: People say I’m a kind, generous, attentive, caring and affectionate lady with a good sense of humor. I think I am very positive! I am very easy-going and I simply adore communication and meeting new people. I have many interests in my life. I’m a person who likes to learn, discover and see new beautiful places. I love animals, flowers, and children. I like absolutely everything that surrounds me and I like to enjoy every moment of my life.I believe that life should be lived actively. I’m cheerful and sociable, a little emotional and romantic, a devoted friend. This is what makes me irresistible. I can be the best wife and perfect hostess, who knows how to charm our guests. Just open up your heart to me. I am optimistic, goal-oriented, reasonable, kind and sensitive woman. I love my family and friends, their devotion is very precious to me. I particularly like to spend my free time with the people I love. I believe that in everything should be balance in a relationship, job, and bringing up children. We should find our “golden mean” and then we will be happy. I am strong and self -confident, but no matter how trivial it sounds, sometimes I want to feel weak and protected in strong and tender man’s hands.
